synopsis.text: As a result of a divine mix-up, the ordinary Takumi Iruma finds himself whisked away to a fantastical realm alongside a group of chosen heroes. To compensate for the error, a benevolent goddess grants him a single wish: the power to choose any skill he desires. Yearning for a serene existence far from the chaos of combat, Takumi selects what appears to be a mundane crafting ability. Little does he know, the 'alchemy' skill he acquires is anything but ordinary! This unforeseen gift allows him to craft everything from sacred swords to soaring ships, transforming him into an invincible warrior and a prosperous merchant. Join Takumi on his unexpected journey as he navigates the thrills and challenges of life as the most powerful alchemist in a magical world!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
